bike.description: Full mid-modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Plus lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, SST tubing diameters, PressFit30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays with post mount disc brakes & 12x142 drop-outs, stainless steel chain stay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox 32 Float 29 CTD Evolution Series w/3-position compression & lock-out,15mm axle, air spring compression, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB Frequency Race i19 TCS 29" tubeless rims, Formula hubs w/sealed cartridge bearings, stainless spokes
SRAM X9 rear and X7 front
Avid Elixir 7 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HS1 rotors
Ritchey Pro 2x bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x +/- 5mm rise x 720mm
Ritchey Pro 2 bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp
